info.name: Tumblr - Klaine logo
info.description: Support your ship! "klaine." to replace the Tumblr logo on your dashboard!
info.additionalInfo: Tested on Firefox only. Please let me know on Tumblr (GeekintheJeep) with any possible alignment issues, questions, or requests! The icons in the second screenshot are also my own work, and can be found here - [x] I hope I'm not stepping on any toes by making this when there are other similar versions available. I couldn't find any others that kept the link to the Tumblr dashboard in the logo, so I made one myself.
